H0.text: what is the female lion called in lion king. Sarabi

H1.text: what is the female lion called in lion king. Sarafina

H2.text: what is the female lion called in lion king. Kiara

H3.text: what is the female lion called in lion king. Nala

A4.text: Nala becomes Simba's wife as well as his Queen Consort

A5.text: Nala is introduced as the daughter of an unnamed lion and Sarafina
